DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Gynecologic Cancer Lymphedema Questionnaire ( GCLQ ) truly detect symptom sign low extremity lymphedema patient diagnose low extremity lymphedema . Lymphedema chronic condition fluid accumulate tissue body . Many cancer survivor live discomfort change activity due limb swell follow cancer treatment . If GCLQ able detect sign symptom lymphedema , investigator hope use tool clinical care set help identify woman risk lymphedema . In future , could improve clinical care use simple feasible way identify low extremity lymphedema measure limb .
DOC.brief_title: Gynecologic Cancer Lymphedema Questionnaire Clinical Care Tool Identify Lower Extremity Lymphedema
